mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAOPAO_GOODS (goods_id, GOODS_TYPE_ID, GOODS_NAME, GOODS_COVER, GOODS_CONT, SELL_PRICE, MARKET_PRICE, GOODS_ADDRESS,GOODS_PERSON, GOODS_TEL, GOODS_QQ,GOODS_EMP_ID, GOODS_SCHOOL_ID, GOODS_IS_USE ,GOODS_IS_DEL, UP_TIME, GOODS_COUNT, GOODS_POSITION,is_zhiying,manager_id,is_youhuo,daili_price) VALUES (#{id}, #{typeId}, #{name}, #{cover, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cont}, #{sellPrice}, #{marketPrice}, #{address}, #{person}, #{tel}, #{qq, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empId}, #{schoolId}, #{isUse}, #{isDel}, #{upTime}, #{count}, 0, #{is_zhiying, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manager_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{is_youhuo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{daili_price,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PAOPAO_GOODS WHERE GOODS_EMP_ID=#{empId} AND GOODS_SCHOOL_ID=#{schoolId} AND GOODS_IS_DEL='0' AND GOODS_IS_USE='0'
mapper.update: UPDATE PAOPAO_GOODS SET GOODS_IS_DEL='1' WHERE GOODS_ID=#{id}

UPDATE PAOPAO_GOODS SET GOODS_NAME=#{name}, GOODS_TYPE_ID=#{typeId},GOODS_COVER=#{cover}, SELL_PRICE=#{sellPrice}, MARKET_PRICE=#{marketPrice}, GOODS_ADDRESS=#{address}, GOODS_PERSON=#{person}, GOODS_TEL=#{tel}, GOODS_QQ=#{qq},GOODS_COUNT=#{count}, GOODS_CONT=#{cont} WHERE GOODS_ID=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT pg.*, le.emp_name as nick_name, le.emp_cover as emp_cover, le.emp_mobile as mobile, co.NAME as school_name FROM PAOPAO_GOODS pg LEFT JOIN lx_emp le ON pg.goods_emp_id=le.emp_id LEFT JOIN COLLEGE co ON pg.GOODS_SCHOOL_ID = co.COID WHERE pg.goods_is_use='0' AND le.is_use='0' AND pg.goods_is_del='0' AND GOODS_ID=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE PAOPAO_GOODS SET GOODS_COUNT = GOODS_COUNT - #{goodsCount} WHERE GOODS_ID=#{id}
UPDATE PAOPAO_GOODS SET goods_is_del='1' WHERE GOODS_EMP_ID=#{empId} AND GOODS_SCHOOL_ID=#{schoolId}
UPDATE PAOPAO_GOODS SET GOODS_POSITION= #{goodsPosition} WHERE goods_id=#{id}
UPDATE PAOPAO_GOODS SET goods_is_use= #{status} WHERE goods_id=#{id}
UPDATE PAOPAO_GOODS SET is_youhuo= #{is_youhuo} WHERE goods_id=#{goods_id}
